snippet: Harvard would secure the conference title outright with a win against Cornell on Saturday and a loss by Princeton in either of its final two games.
abstract: Harvard defeats Columbia, 56-51, in men's college basketball.
lead_paragraph: Harvard would secure the conference title outright with a win against Cornell on Saturday and a loss by Princeton in either of its final two games.

headline.seo: Harvard Moves Into First Place in Ivy League
headline.main: Harvard Takes Lead in Mens Ivy League Conference
